meanings.definition: A surgical procedure in which a joint is examined using an arthroscope.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed arthroscopies on the patient's knee to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: The hospital conducted several arthroscopies last week to diagnose joint problems.
meanings.sent3: During the arthroscopies, the tiny camera revealed a surprise visitor - a small spider!
meanings.sent4: The arthroscopies acted like tiny detectives, uncovering the hidden secrets of the joint.
meanings.sent5: The arthroscopies provided a clear view inside the joint, like a tiny window into the body.
